content: complimentary pattern linda hat design by j h walter pattern no for use with 202324 woolstok tweed aran for use with woolstok tweed aran linda hat design by j h walter description a classic and cozy ribbed hat that highlights the unique texture of woolstok tweed knit with just one hank this unisex hat makes the perfect gift for everyone you know experience level gauge in rib 17 sts and 19 row = 4 advanced beginner sizes finished measurements 19 relaxed one circumference 8½ height materials yarn needles 6mm 16 circular needle or size needed to woolstok tweed aran size 10 obtain gauge 85% fine highland wool / 15% donegal 100g/109yds 6mm double pointed needles or size needed size 10 1 hank to obtain gauge color shown no 3300 rolled oats other tools stitch marker tapestry needle p 02 blue sky fibers notes change to double pointed needles when stitches no longer fit comfortably on circular needle hat will use most of the hank continue to check both stitch and row gauge throughout step no 1 hat co 80 sts pm and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts *k2 p2 repeat from * to end round 1 repeat round 1 until piece meas 7 from the co edge crown shaping *k2 p2tog repeat from * to end 60 sts round 1 *k2 p1 repeat from * to end round 2 *ssk p1 repeat from * to end 40 sts round 3 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end round 4 *ssk p2tog repeat from * to end 20 sts round 5 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end round 6 *k2tog repeat from * to end 10 sts round 7 cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts and pull to close step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang p 03 blue sky fibers abbreviations co cast on round s round s k knit ssk slip slip knit slip 2 meas measures stitches separately knitwise ndl s needle s insert left needle in front of 2 p purl slipped stitches knit 2 slipped p2tog purl 2 stitches together stitches together pm place marker * repeat the directions between the rem remaining asterisks as many times as repeat repeat indicated p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2023 this
